charges.charge_description: False representation to be  citizen of the United States.  PENALTY:  3 Years and/or $250,000.00; $100 CVF; 1 Year SRT(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 6 mos imprs; 1 yr SRT; all standard and mandatory conditions of supervised release apply; Special condition: if the defendant is deported, he is not to return to the United States illegally; $100.00 Special Assessment-REMITTED; fine waived [because of the defendants inability to pay]; waived right to appeal however defendant is advised of right to appeal (notified of 14 day deadline); defendant was advised appeal would be free of charge.

charges.charge_description: False Statement to Federal Agency or Agent.  PENALTY:  5 Years and/or $250,000.00 fine or both; $100 CVF; 3 Year SRT(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Gov't oral motion to dismiss - GRANTED.

charges.charge_description: Misuse of Passport.  PENALTY:  10 Years and/or $250,000.00 fine or both; $100 CVF; 3 Year SRT(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Gov't oral motion to dismiss - GRANTED.

charges.charge_description: 18:1544,1001, 911 - Willfully &; knowingly use or attempt to use any passport issued or designed for the use of another.
